posts._title: Whitney Horn & Lev Kalman – Two Plains & a Fancy (2018)
posts.title: Two Plains & a Fancy
posts.excerpt: Described on its Kickstarter page as “..a satirical, experimental “Spa Western” set in Colorado in 1893”. The narrative follows a group of 3 women who travel around the landscapes and strange towns of 1890s Colorado, originally looking for natural springs, but with various absurdist detours and side-tracks. Not in popular taste or catering to a …

posts.title: Stage Fright
posts.excerpt: A 1950 British crime film directed and produced by Alfred Hitchcock starring Jane Wyman, Marlene Dietrich, Michael Wilding and Richard Todd. posts.title: Le Socrate [Jacqueline Plessis version]
posts.excerpt: Shows the eccentricties of Le Socrate, a philosopher who has divorced himself from materialistic society and a local policeman assigned to watch him. scenario : Jean-Patrick Manchette

posts._title: Hadar Friedlich – Emek Tiferet AKA Beautiful Valley (2011)
posts.title: Emek Tiferet
posts.excerpt: The world of Hanna Mendelssohn, an 80 year old widow, disintegrates as the Kibbutz which she helped to found undergoes privatization.
